title: feSpotLight
shortDescriptionOfTheTag: The feSpotLight SVG filter primitive creates a spotlight lighting effect.

usageExamples.title: Example 1
usageExamples.description: Creating a spotlight effect with feSpotLight.
usageExamples.code:
<svg width='400' height='200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'>
  <defs>
    <filter id='exampleFilter' x='0' y='0' width='200%' height='200%'>
      <feOffset result='offOut' in='SourceGraphic' dx='20' dy='20' />
      <feBlend in='SourceGraphic' in2='offOut' mode='normal' />
      <feSpotLight x='50' y='30' z='70' pointsAtX='20' pointsAtY='20' pointsAtZ='20' />
    </filter>
  </defs>
  <rect width='90' height='90' filter='url(#exampleFilter)' />
</svg>
